title: By the King the spreading of the infection in our citie of London, and in the places next about it, doeth giue vs iust cause to be as prouident as a carefull prince can bee, to take away all occasion of increasing the same.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
publicationStmtPublisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,
